#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
   while(true){
    long long a,b,c;
    cin>>a;
    cin>>b;
    cin>>c;
    if(a==0 && b==0 && c==0)break;

    if(b+b==a+c){
        cout<<"AP "<<b+c-a<<endl;
        continue;
    }
    if(b*b==a*c){
        cout<<"GP "<<(b*c)/a<<endl;
        continue;
    }
   }
}
